p: Erucic acid was obtained as a white waxy compound. Its molecular formula, C 22H 42O 2, was established by the HRESIMS ion at m/z 339.3178 [M + H] + (calcd for C 22H 43O 2, 339.3181). 1H-NMR (CD 3Cl, 400 MHz) δ: δ5.36 (2H, m, H-13,14), 2.36 (2H, J = 7.2 Hz), 2.03 (2H, m), 1.64 (2H, m), 1.28 (28H, s, CH 2), 0.89 (3H, m, –CH 3). 13C-NMR (CD 3Cl, 100 MHz) δ: 179.89(C-1), 129.91 (C-13), 129.89 (C-14), 34.01–22.70 (–CH 2–), 14.13 (-CH 3).
